item.description:
It seems the group enjoyed our last hike in the Blue Hills, so I'd like to plan for another hike in that area. This time we can hike the skyline loop in the other direction and throw in the red loop by the Trailside Museum.

Plan for about 2-3 hours in the woods with you pet. Please bring plenty of water and a snack if you so wish.

Be prepared for a moderate pace. This is not a walk in the woods, but we're not running up and down the hills either.

I'm open to suggestions and will adjust the hike accordingly to accomodate the various skill levels and desires of the group.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with the Pitbull and green Chevy pickup
item.name: Exploring The Blue Hills - Part Deux
